Activity Description: This program will help African governments improve their capacities to respond to food insecurity caused or exacerbated by extreme climate events by increasing access to risk insurance products that would make them less vulnerable to future shocks.

Activity Name: Governance, Response Readiness, Institutional and Community Preparedness in Southeast Bangladesh (GRIP) Activity.
Activity Description: Strengthening Disaster Risk Governance and Community Early Warning and Early Action Systems for Multi-hazard Preparedness and Response in Southeastern Bangladesh.
To support the IFRC Disaster Relief Emergency Fund program to replensh funds allocated for population movements resulting from conflict

Funding to support IFRC's National Society Investment Alliance for strategic development and capacity building, and the Disaster Relief Emergency Fund for operations for population movements resulting from conflict-related emergencies

Activity Name: Partnership for Regional East Africa Counterterrorism (PREACT): Early Warning/Early Response for Countering Violent Extremism
Activity Description: Expand field of research and applicability of innovative and effective early warning and early response systems for Countering Violent Extremism (CVE) among practitioners in Djibouti, Kenya, Tanzania, Uganda, and Somalia. Managed by Embassy Djibouti.

Activity Name: VMS Early Warning and Early Response V2
Activity Description: To reduce violence against civilians in at-risk areas of Nigeria by enhancing early warning and early response efforts.
